seller_description: Strengthen and renew hair with OGX Argan Oil of Morocco Penetrating Hair Oil Treatment. Ideal for all hair types and textures, the rich hair oil helps penetrate the hair shaft while renewing and softening hair. Formulated with a hydrating blend of rich cold-pressed Moroccan argan oil, it helps revive hair to leave it nourished and silky smooth. A nourishing hair oil seals in nutrients and shine to help improve hair strength and elasticity, leaving you with touchable tresses that are soft but strong. Plus, the citrus-fresh, floral-green and woody scent makes hair care an all-around sensory experience and leaves locks with an irresistibly good smell. Free of parabens and sulfated surfactants, this hair oil for damaged hair is gentle enough to give locks a radiant shine from the inside out. For a full hair care routine that'll leave your hair lush and divinely shiny, pair with Renewing + Argan Oil of Morocco Shampoo and Conditioner and other OGX Moroccan oil hair products.
review: I absolutely love it. Price is right.Leaves hair soft does not feel greasyI have very dry hairAnd it leaves it manageableWhen ironingAnd I love this product.Totally recommend it.Buying it again.
Expected_output: The OGX Argan Oil of Morocco Penetrating Hair Oil Treatment promises to strengthen and renew hair by deeply penetrating the hair shaft with cold-pressed Moroccan argan oil. The product is marketed as suitable for all hair types, aiming to soften and nourish hair while sealing in nutrients for improved strength, elasticity, and shine. The seller's images accurately depict the product's design and packaging, matching the buyer's photos of the oil. The buyer's review aligns closely with the seller's claims, expressing satisfaction with the product's ability to leave hair soft, manageable, and non-greasy, even for very dry hair. The product's citrus-fresh and floral scent is also consistent with the sensory experience described in the seller's description. The absence of parabens and sulfated surfactants highlights the product's gentle formulation, which resonates with the buyer's appreciation of its effectiveness. There are no discrepancies between the seller's promises and the buyer's experience. Both the visual and functional aspects of the product meet expectations, and the buyer is highly satisfied. No fault lies with either party, as the product delivers exactly what it advertises.
label: 1:Here buyer satisfied with seller
